name: Trail Pass Fest Brew
description: Available for a limited time! Shipping to all lower 48 states except GA, ID, MI, MS, TN, and WV. The steins are shined, the tents are ready, and—thanks to Trail Pass—your glass is full of non-alcoholic Fest Brew. It’s packed with the rich flavor and smooth drinkability of a classic Festbier, but without the alcohol, so you can keep the party going strong. Prost! Trail Pass uses traditional brewing methods, not alcohol removal, to create full craft flavor below the 0.5% ABV non-alcoholic threshold. Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Hop Splash Variety Pack
description: Shipping to all lower 48 states. Treat your tastebuds to a splash of bubbly refreshment, crafted with the perfect pairing of real fruit juice and vibrant hops for a welcome flavor escape - anytime, anywhere. This zero-alcohol alternative delivers our signature Sierra Nevada hop flavor with every sip. Includes three varieties: Grapefruit & Blood Orange, Lemon & Lime, Peach & Passion Fruit Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Hop Splash Sparkling Hop Water
description: Shipping to all lower 48 states. When hop cravings hit, drench them with Hop Splash, our sparkling water infused with Citra and Amarillo® varieties known for bright and fruity flavors. Hop Splash has zero alcohol, zero calories, and maximum hop refreshment. Check out the Hop Splash tasting video. Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Trail Pass Variety Pack
description: SHIPPING TO ALL LOWER 48 STATES EXCEPT GA, ID, MI, MS, TN, AND WV. Grab a 12-Pack Trail Pass Variety Pack and start a non-stop adventure. With new brews like our juicy Hazy IPA and crushable Brewveza alongside our classic IPA and Golden, you’re packed for miles of flavor whichever path you choose. Trail Pass uses traditional brewing methods, not alcohol removal, to create full craft flavor below the 0.5% ABV non-alcoholic threshold. Trail Pass Brewveza: Refreshing flavor and a crisp finish, perfectly crushable for the beach, the bike trail, or the backyard. Trail Pass Hazy IPA: Bursting with Mosaic and El Dorado hops. It’s a juicy flavorscape fit for any adventure. Trail Pass Golden: Packed with fruity aromas, bright floral notes, and smooth malt. Trail Pass IPA: Hoppy notes of citrus and pine, plus a silky malt body and clean hop bitterness. PRICE IS INCLUSIVE OF CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Hop Splash Grapefruit & Blood Orange Sparkling Hop Water
description: Shipping to all lower 48 states. Take the fruity notes of Mosaic® and Simcoe hops, add a perfect splash of real blood orange and grapefruit juice, and you’ve got a match for maximum flavor. Reach for Hop Splash Citrus, your all-day hop refreshment. Carbon-Filtered Water: Hop Splash starts with the same water we use for brewing beer. It’s carbon-filtered to ensure the highest-quality H₂O out of the gate. Real Hops, Real Juice: We pair up real Mosaic® and Simcoe hops with real blood orange and grapefruit juice for an all-day, IPA-inspired flavor party. Sustainable CO2: We capture, clean, and reuse carbon dioxide from beer fermentation to carbonate Hop Splash, keeping CO2 out of the atmosphere and closing the loop. Check out the Hop Splash tasting video here. Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Trail Pass Golden
description: Shipping to all lower 48 states except GA, ID, MI, MS, TN, and WV. Grab a Trail Pass and start a new adventure with miles of flavor. Explore the smooth malt and crisp finish in non-alcoholic Trail Pass Golden, a refreshing easy-drinker with a surge of hops for bright floral and citrus notes. “If a craft drinker is looking for that non-alc option, but still wants a complete beer experience, this is gonna do it for them,” says James Conery, Innovation Brewmaster at Sierra Nevada. Recently, Trail Pass Golden landed on Food & Wine's list of the 8 best non-alcoholic beers to drink this summer. Trail Pass uses traditional brewing methods, not alcohol removal, to create full craft flavor below the 0.5% ABV non-alcoholic threshold. ABV: 0.0-0.5% IBUs: 15 Calories: 95 per 12oz can Carbs: 19g per 12oz can Check out the Trail Pass Golden tasting video here. Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.

name: Trail Pass IPA
description: Shipping to all lower 48 states except GA, ID, MI, MS, TN, and WV. Grab a Trail Pass and start a new adventure with miles of flavor. Explore the hoppy notes of citrus and pine from Amarillo® and CTZ varieties in non-alcoholic Trail Pass IPA. The silky malt body and clean hop bitterness are just what you’d expect from a world-class Sierra Nevada IPA, yet it’s less than 0.5% ABV. “It meets all of our criteria for what we would consider a craft IPA—not necessarily even a craft non-alcoholic IPA, but a craft IPA,” says James Conery, Innovation Brewmaster at Sierra Nevada. Trail Pass uses traditional brewing methods, not alcohol removal, to create full craft flavor below the 0.5% ABV non-alcoholic threshold. ABV: 0.0-0.5% IBUs: 35 Calories: 95 per 12oz can Carbs: 20g per 12oz can Check out the Trail Pass IPA tasting video here. Price is inclusive of CA CRV. Hop Splash and Trail Pass orders are fulfilled within 2-3 business days. Please note that if you are located in an area experiencing winter weather or freezing conditions, we may hold your shipment to ensure it is not damaged during delivery.
